name: KAI to KAI
description:
*** iOS version is now available! Check it! ***

You can play this game by a simple mouse click.

Click inside of "□" to place smaller "□", and turn these into "回" kanji. 
The closer to the center, the higher the score.
But if you clicked outside of "□" or place smaller "□" where doesn't make "回", your score will be decreased.

Aim for a high score within the time limit of 60 seconds.
